name: Peppers Broadbeach

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have travelled to the Gold Coast a few times and stayed in different accommodation each time. When Peppers came on line, we were looking forward to giving it a try.
reviews.title: Really wanted to love it.

reviews.text: Unfortunately even though we had booked 4 months in advance for an 'Ocean View Room' it was anything but. It should have been an 'Obstructed Ocean View Room', I have posted the photo's and you can see for yourselves.
reviews.title: Awesome

reviews.text: The staff we friendly and efficient but the view, of which we had been looking forward to was the big let down. There were some other little issues that in isolation weren't big issues but they all painted a picture of a room that was thrown together at the last minute.
reviews.title: Great service

reviews.text: The room on first look is well appointed and has all the necessary appliances but the finishes leave a lot to be desired. Expensive and luxurious appliances let down by cheap plastic bins, cheap towels and bathroom fittings and the lack of curtain/cover for the window between the en suite and bedroom.
reviews.title: A slice of heaven.

reviews.text: It is the only bathroom in the apartment and when lying on the bed anyone showering and sitting on the toilet is in full view and visa-versa. It's very strange that this would be overlooked.
reviews.title: Amazing hotel and service!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed in a 2 bedroom ocean view suite for the long week-end. When booking the accomodation I requested a high floor, and we were on the 32nd floor, although the weather was not kind to us the accomodation made up for it. The suite was furnished very well and the feel of the room was as if we were the first ones to actually stay and sleep in the bed. The staff were very friendly and accomodating nothing was too much trouble. The location is excellent as you can walk to wonderful restaraunts, shopping and the beach, no need for a car at all. We will be staying again and taking all the family next time.
reviews.title: Very Special

reviews.text: We recently enjoyed our second stay in 12 months at peppers broadbeach. Family with 2 kids, 5 & 8. We had 2br ocean premium apt, which is tower 1, closest to the beach and a high floor. Gorgeous views and lovely clean, modern and new building. Staff are great and location is perfect. Pool on level 4 was warm most days ( wind cools it some days) and spa nice and warm. Location perfect and I'm always pleased we are not in surfers which I find cluttered and tacky. Great beach, park for kids, bike/ scoooter / walk paths,woolworths, shops, cafes and lovely endota spa. Theaterette was great. Now if only they had a kids club it would be perfect! Or supervised movies fri and sat nts for kids while parents go out? ( people with kids like luxury accom too! Thats why they are all in fiji and bali....) we did use the babysitting service which was good but expensive. This year we were disappointed that the complimentary movies were restricted and many were $18/ movie which is very dear when they are $3 to hire. A few more pieces of play equipment are needed in the play area near the bbq. Great meal at nearby moo moo restaurant. Highly recommended.
reviews.title: Beautiful property

reviews.text: We stayed at this great hotel in a 2 bedroom ocean view suite for 7 nights just recently as our daughter was being married and found it to be an excellent Hotel that suited our needs in every way.
reviews.title: GREAT HOTEL & LOCATION

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: PRO'S
reviews.title: Heaven on a Stick

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: -Courteous and obliging staff. Reception, concierge, and room staff (housekeeping) went above and beyond their portfolios and were always ready to please.
reviews.title: Keeps getting better

reviews.text: This place is stunning! I stayed here for business for 3 nights and it was a pleasure to wake up in the morning and look out to a beautiful sunrise over the gorgeous coast! Location is great, so many restaurants and shopping around the hotel. The quality was amazing, the bed was the most comfortable I've been in, the bathrooms were stunning and the outlook perfect. Would def go back again! :)
reviews.title: Best sleep in a while!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My partner and I stayed here for 3 nights in May. The staff are there to help you through-out your stay. We stayed in a one bedroom apartment in tower 2 and had a lovely ocean view from the 11th floor, the room was very spacious, clean and had everything you need. The hotel is in a perfect position in the heart of Broadbeach. Complimentary use of an Ipad and free on demand movies a nice touch.
reviews.title: Enjoyed every moment

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Would definitely stay here again and would recommend it to anyone wanting a luxury getaway.
reviews.title: Great Escape

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I stayed at the Hilton at Surfers Paradise earlier this year and I must say that Peppers at Broadbeach is definitely the better of the two.
reviews.title: Sophisticated

reviews.text: What a beautiful place to go a chill out away from it all if you want, or you can experience all that Broadbeach has to offer. The staff were very attentive and many thanks to Danielle who went the extra mile. I particularly enjoyed playing with the ipad as i can't make up my mind between that or the samsung. I thught the pillow menu was a great idea and it contributed to a good nights sleep. Well worth a visit
reviews.title: Great three day stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have stayed at many five star resorts on the Gold Coast and this one is up there with the best! We are actually still here on day 5 of 6 and have loved every minute of it! We are on the 16th floor of Tower 2 in a 2 bedroomed ocean view apartment which is my favorite accommodation of all my hotel stays... It really is home from home! Spacious, clean, modern and minimalistic... Simply gorgeous! Gorgeous sea views greet you from every window... Heaven! In the darkness, the surrounding night lights are just as beautiful! The beds and pillows make for an extremely good nights sleep... We woke at 11.30 today and that was with the phone! Every single member of staff we have encountered from reception to portering to maintenance to housekeeping have been professional, helpful and friendly! We ring down to ask for our room to be serviced whilst we nip out and an hour later it's done... Beautifully! The facilities are exceptional including the pool, the heated outdoor spa, the gym, sauna and steam room! If you enjoy movies then do hire out the theatrette! You are given a three hour time slot in which to use it! There's a choice of beanbags, recliner chairs or an enclosed circular seating area for you to watch your movie and various lighting settings! I would advise you to take your own DVD as there was a problem with their hire machine whilst we were there but a trip to Crazy Clarks for a $2 one soon sorted that out! Our expectations for a movie of that price were low but it was actually really good! Our holiday was simply to chill out and the complimentary in room movies made that very achievable... Great idea! The I pad was also a great idea... Especially as that's what I'm writing this review on! The extras that would have given this hotel ten out of ten would have been a daily complimentary newspaper and hotel in room dining though I acknowledge they have sorted alternatives until this is implemented... There is a minimum order and delivery charge when using this though! That said... The choice of dining surrounding the area is huge but the room is so gorgeous you simply don't want to leave it sometimes!!! Finally... It was my birthday on the day of arrival so later that evening a bottle of bubbly and a card was delivered to our room! The card was signed by six or seven of the staff on duty which made it very personal... Thank you for that! Unfortunately, I smashed a glass in the process of opening it but reception brushed that aside politely and said they would ask Housekeeping to replace it for us... Nothing was ever too much trouble!!!! We're gonna be sad to leave our second home! If anyone is considering coming to this hotel then do it... You will not be disappointed! :-)
reviews.title: Home from Home!

reviews.text: We arrived after a long trip from europe only to be welcomed by a very friendly receptionist and a beautiful 5 star hotel. We were on the coast visiting friends and we felt very much at home in an appartment in this hotel. Surrounded by great shops, cafes, places to eat, and we found a nice place to get your hair done(Golds)
reviews.title: 5 fab days in broadbeach!

reviews.text: Facilities are good with a nice BBQ area, pool table, Garden, Gym etc.....We thought the porters were all so friendly and stylish.
reviews.title: Everything you could ever want!!!

reviews.text: We ordered the take away from local restaraunts but i wouldnt recommend it as it was very expensive.
reviews.title: This place makes your holiday a success!

reviews.text: We hope to come back in our next trip to australia.
reviews.title: Great hotel in lovely location

description: Soak up the cutting-edge sophistication of the new cosmopolitan Peppers Broadbeach, boasting everything hi-tech and high-end for the ultimate in comfort and convenience. Peppers Broadbeach includes two towers that soar high above Broadbeach only 25 minutes drive from the Gold Coast Airport. Guests will enjoy the perfect mix of the Gold Coast's city and coastal lifestyle while enjoying the luxurious surrounds of one and two bedroom suites and three bedroom sky homes. All suites boast exceptional interior design with European appliances and imported stone featured throughout. Signature features of the resort include a pillow menu, gourmet minibar with local and organic products and a pre-order gourmet pantry service. The resort is also one of the most technologically advanced in Australia offering the latest in portable technology and guest services. Guests can also enjoy iPod docks, on-demand movies and wireless internet within their rooms.
